title: Two Friends, Too Old
description: What happens when old age collides with old friendship? Frank and Clay have been best friends since the first day of first grade so when advancing age sends Clay spiraling into mental decay, Frank is determined to help him. He stumbles upon a drug that might do the trick and for a while this works. But when Clay stops taking the drug he puts into harmâ€™s way this life-long friendship and Frank must come to grips with a Clay he has never seen.
author: Robert           Scott
